p: For analysis of TMSE sterols, the following chromatographic conditions were used: injector and detector temperature was 300 째C; oven temperature of 260 째C was held for 4 min, then increased to 300 째C at 1.5 째C/min, and the final temperature was held for 30 min; carrier gas (He) flow rate was 1.2 mL/min.
